gurmukhi: < siqgur pRswid ]
transliteration: Ik Oankaar Sat(i)gura Prasaadh ॥
translation: The Lord is One and He can be attained through the Grace of The True Guru.

gurmukhi: kbXo bwc bynqI ]
transliteration: Kabayo Baacha Benatee ॥
translation: Speech of the poet.

gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
transliteration: Chaupaee ॥
translation: Chaupai

gurmukhi: hmrI kro hwQ dY r`Cw ] pUrn hoie ic`q kI ie`Cw ]
transliteration: Hamaree Karo Haath Dai Rachchhaa ॥ Poorana Hoei Chitta Kee Eichchhaa ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands all the desires of my heart be fulfilled.

gurmukhi: qv crnn mn rhY hmwrw ] Apnw jwn kro pRiqpwrw ]377]
transliteration: Tva Charanna Mana Rahai Hamaara ॥ Apanaa Jaana Karo Prat(i)paara ॥377॥
translation: Let my mind rest under Thy Feet; sustain me, considering me Thine own.377.

gurmukhi: hmry duSt sBY qum Gwvhu ] Awpu hwQ dY moih bcwvhu ]
transliteration: Hamare Dushatt Sabhai Tuma Ghaavhu ॥ Aapu Haath Dai Mohi Bachaavhu ॥
translation: Destroy, O Lord ! all my enemies and protect me with Thine won Hnads.

gurmukhi: suKI bsY moro pirvwrw ] syvk is`KX sBY krqwrw ]378]
transliteration: Sukhee Basai Moro Parivaara ॥ Sevaka Sikkhaya Sabhai Karataara ॥378॥
translation: May my family live in comfort and ease alongwith all my servants and disciples.378.

gurmukhi: mo r`Cw inju kr dY kirXY ] sB bYirn kO Awj sMGirXY ]
transliteration: Mo Rachchhaa Niju Kara Dai Kariyai ॥ Sabha Bairina Kou Aaja Saanghariyai ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands and destroy this day all my enemies;

gurmukhi: pUrn hoie hmwrI Awsw ] qoir Bjn kI rhY ipXwsw ]379]
transliteration: Poorana Hoei Hamaaree Aasa ॥ Tori Bhajana Kee Rahai Piyaasa ॥379॥
translation: May all the aspirations be fulfilled; let my thirst for Thy Name remain afresh.379.

gurmukhi: qumih Cwif koeI Avr n DXwaUN ] jo br choN su qumqy pwaUN ]
transliteration: Tumahi Chhaadi Koeala Avara Na Dhayaaooaaŉ ॥ Jo Bara Chahoaaŉ Su Tumate Paaooaaŉ ॥
translation: I may remember none else except Thee; and obtain all the required boons from Thee;

gurmukhi: syvk is`KX hmwry qwirXih ] cun cun S`qRu hmwry mwirXih ]380]
transliteration: Sevaka Sikkhaya Hamaare Taariyahi ॥ Chuna Chuna Shattru Hamaare Maariyahi ॥380॥
translation: Let my servants and disciples cross the world-ocean; all my enemies be singled out and killed.380.

gurmukhi: Awpu hwQ dY muJY aubirXY ] mrn kwl qRws invirXY ]
transliteration: Aapu Haath Dai Mujhai Aubariyai ॥ Maran Kaal Taraas Nivariyai ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands and relieve me form the fear of death;

gurmukhi: hUjo sdw hmwry p`Cw ] sRI AisDuj jU kirXhu r`Cw ]381]
transliteration: Hoojo Sadaa Hamaare Pachchhaa ॥ Sree Asidhuja Joo Kariyahu Rachchhaa ॥381॥
translation: May Thou ever Bestow Thy favours on my side; Protect me O Lord ! Thou, the Supreme Destroyer.381.

gurmukhi: rwiK lyhu muih rwKnhwry ] swihb sMq shwie ipXwry ]
transliteration: Raakhi Lehu Muhi Raakhanahaare ॥ Saahiba Saant Sahaaei Piyaare ॥
translation: Protect me, O Lord ! Thou, the Protector, O Lord ! Most dear, the Protector of the Saints:

gurmukhi: dInbMDu duStn ky hMqw ] qumho purI cqurds kMqw ]382]
transliteration: Deenabaandhu Dushattna Ke Haanta ॥ Tumaho Puree Chaturadasa Kaanta ॥382॥
translation: Friend of poor and the Destroyer of the enemies; Thou art the Master of the fourteen worlds.382.

gurmukhi: kwl pwie bRhmw bpu Drw ] kwl pwie iSvjU Avqrw ]
transliteration: Kaal Paaei Barahamaa Bapu Dharaa ॥ Kaal Paaei Shivajoo Avataraa ॥
translation: In due time Brahma appeared in physical form; in due time Shiva incarnated;

gurmukhi: kwl pwie kir ibSn pRkwSw ] skl kwl kw kIXw qmwSw ]383]
transliteration: Kaal Paaei Kari Bishana Prakaashaa ॥ Sakala Kaal Kaa Keeyaa Tamaashaa ॥383॥
translation: In due time Vishnu manifested himself; all this is the play of the Temporal Lord.383.

gurmukhi: jvn kwl jogI iSv kIXo ] byd rwj bRhmw jU QIXo ]
transliteration: Javana Kaal Jogee Shiva Keeyo ॥ Beda Raaja Barahamaa Joo Theeyo ॥
translation: The Temporal Lord, who created Shiva, the Yogi; who created Brahma, the Master of the Vedas;

gurmukhi: jvn kwl sB lok svwrw ] nmSkwr hY qwih hmwrw ]384]
transliteration: Javana Kaal Sabha Lok Savaara ॥ Namashakaar Hai Taahi Hamaara ॥384॥
translation: The Temporal Lord who fashioned the entire world; I salute the same Lord.384.

gurmukhi: jvn kwl sB jgq bnwXo ] dyv dYq j`Cn aupjwXo ]
transliteration: Javana Kaal Sabha Jagata Banaayo ॥ Deva Dait Jachchhana Aupajaayo ॥
translation: The Temporal Lord, who created the whole world; who created gods, demons and yakshas;

gurmukhi: Awid AMiq eykY Avqwrw ] soeI gurU smiJXhu hmwrw ]385]
transliteration: Aadi Aanti Eekai Avataara ॥ Soeala Guroo Samajhiyahu Hamaara ॥385॥
translation: He is the only one form the beginning to the end; I consider Him only my Guru.385.

gurmukhi: nmSkwr iqs hI ko hmwrI ] skl pRjw ijn Awp svwrI ]
transliteration: Namashakaar Tisa Hee Ko Hamaaree ॥ Sakala Prajaa Jina Aapa Savaaree ॥
translation: I salute Him, non else, but Him; who has created Himself and His subject;

gurmukhi: isvkn ko svgun suK dIXo ] S`qRun ko pl mo bD kIXo ]386]
transliteration: Sivakana Ko Savaguna Sukha Deeyo ॥ Shattruna Ko Pala Mo Badh Keeyo ॥386॥
translation: He bestows Divine virtues and happiness on His servants; He destroys the enemies instantly.386.

gurmukhi: Gt Gt ky AMqr kI jwnq ] Bly bury kI pIr pCwnq ]
transliteration: Ghatt Ghatt Ke Aantr Kee Jaanata ॥ Bhale Bure Kee Peera Pachhaanata ॥
translation: He knows the inner feelings of every heart; He knows the anguish of both good and bad;

gurmukhi: cItI qy kuMcr AsQUlw ] sB pr ikRpw idRSit kir PUlw ]387]
transliteration: Cheettee Te Kuanchara Asathoolaa ॥ Sabha Pra Karipaa Darishatti Kari Phoolaa ॥387॥
translation: From the ant to the solid elephant; He casts His Graceful glance on all and feels pleased.387.

gurmukhi: sMqn duK pwey qy duKI ] suK pwey swDn ky suKI ]
transliteration: Saantna Dukha Paaee Te Dukhee ॥ Sukha Paaee Saadhna Ke Sukhee ॥
translation: He is painful, when He sees His saints in grief; He is happy, when His saints are happy.

gurmukhi: eyk eyk kI pIr pCwnY ] Gt Gt ky pt pt kI jwnY ]388]
transliteration: Eeka Eeka Kee Peera Pachhaanai ॥ Ghatt Ghatt Ke Patt Patt Kee Jaanai ॥388॥
translation: He knows the agony of everyone; He knows the innermost secrets of every heart.388.

gurmukhi: jb audkrK krw krqwrw ] pRjw Drq qb dyh Apwrw ]
transliteration: Jaba Audakarakha Karaa Karataara ॥ Prajaa Dharata Taba Deha Apaara ॥
translation: When the Creator projected Himself, His creation manifested itself in innumerable forms;

gurmukhi: jb AwkrK krq ho kbhUM ] qum mY imlq dyh Dr sBhUM ]389]
transliteration: Jaba Aakarakha Karata Ho Kabahooan ॥ Tuma Mai Milata Deha Dhara Sabhahooan ॥389॥
translation: When at any time He withdraws His creation, all the physical forms are merged in Him.389.

gurmukhi: jyqy bdn isRSit sB DwrY ] Awpu AwpunI bUiJ aucwrY ]
transliteration: Jete Badana Sarishatti Sabha Dhaari ॥ Aapu Aapunee Boojhi Auchaari ॥
translation: All the bodies of living beings created in the world speak about Him according to their understanding;

gurmukhi: qum sB hI qy rhq inrwlm ] jwnq byd Byd Aru Awlm ]390]
transliteration: Tuma Sabha Hee Te Rahata Niraalma ॥ Jaanata Beda Bheda Aru Aalma ॥390॥
translation: But Thou, O Lord ! live quite apart form everything; this fact is know to the Vedas and the learned.390.

gurmukhi: inrMkwr inRibkwr inRlMB ] Awid AnIl Anwid AsMB ]
transliteration: Niraankar Naribikaar Narilaanbh ॥ Aadi Aneela Anaadi Asaanbh ॥
translation: The Lord is Formless, Sinless and shelterless: He is the Primal Power, Blemishlless, Behinningless and Unborn;

gurmukhi: qwkw mUVH aucwrq Bydw ] jwko Byv n pwvq bydw ]391]
transliteration: Taakaa Moorharaha Auchaarta Bhedaa ॥ Jaako Bheva Na Paavta Bedaa ॥391॥
translation: The fool claims boastfully about the knowledge of His secrets, which even the Vedas do not know.391.

gurmukhi: qwkO kir pwhn Anumwnq ] mhW mUVH kCu Byd n jwnq ]
transliteration: Taakou Kari Paahana Anumaanata ॥ Mahaa Moorharaha Kachhu Bheda Na Jaanata ॥
translation: The fool considers Him a stone, but the great fool does not know any secret;

gurmukhi: mhWdyv kO khq sdw iSv ] inrMkwr kw cInq nih iBv ]392]
transliteration: Mahaadeva Kou Kahata Sadaa Shiva ॥ Niraankar Kaa Cheenata Nahi Bhiva ॥392॥
translation: He calls Shiva “The Eternal Lord, “but he does not know the secret of the Formless Lord.392.

gurmukhi: Awpu AwpunI buiD hY jyqI ] brnq iBMn iBMn quih qyqI ]
transliteration: Aapu Aapunee Budhi Hai Jetee ॥ Baranta Bhianna Bhianna Tuhi Tetee ॥
translation: According to one;s won intellect, one describes Thee differently;

gurmukhi: qumrw lKw n jwie pswrw ] ikh ibiD sjw pRQm sMswrw ]393]
transliteration: Tumaraa Lakhaa Na Jaaei Pasaara ॥ Kiha Bidhi Sajaa Prathma Saansaara ॥393॥
translation: The limits of Thy creation cannot be known and how the world was fashioned in the beginning?393.

gurmukhi: eykY rUp AnUp srUpw ] rMk BXo rwv khIN BUpw ]
transliteration: Eekai Roop Anoop Saroopa ॥ Raank Bhayo Raav Kaheeaaŉ Bhoopa ॥
translation: He hath only one unparalleled Form; He manifests Himself as a poor man or a king at different places;

gurmukhi: AMfj jyrj syqj kInI ] auqBuj Kwin bhuir ric dInI ]394]
transliteration: Aandja Jeraja Setaja Keenee ॥ Autabhuja Khaani Bahuri Rachi Deenee ॥394॥
translation: He created creatures from eggs, wombs and perspiration; then He created the vegetable kingdom.394.

gurmukhi: khUM PUil rwjw hÍY bYTw ] khUM ismit BXo SMkr iekYTw ]
transliteration: Kahooan Phooli Raajaa Havai Baitthaa ॥ Kahooan Simatti Bhayo Shaankra Eikaitthaa ॥
translation: Somewhere He sits joyfully as a king; somewhere He contracts Himself as Shiva, the Yogi;

gurmukhi: sgrI isRSit idKwie AcMBv ] Awid jugwid srUp suXMBv ]395]
transliteration: Sagaree Sarishatti Dikhaaei Achaanbhva ॥ Aadi Jugaadi Saroop Suyaanbhva ॥395॥
translation: All His creation unfolds wonderful things; He, the Primal Power, is from the beginning and Self-Existent.395.

gurmukhi: Ab r`Cw myrI qum kro ] is`KX aubwir Ais`KX s`Gro ]
transliteration: Aba Rachchhaa Meree Tuma Karo ॥ Sikkhaya Aubaari Asikkhaya Saggharo ॥
translation: O Lord ! keep me now under Thy protection; protect my disciples and destroy my enemies;

gurmukhi: duSt ijqy auTvq auqpwqw ] skl mlyC kro rx Gwqw ]396]
transliteration: Dushatt Jite Autthavata Autapaata ॥ Sakala Malechha Karo Rana Ghaata ॥396॥
translation: All the villains creations outrage and all the infidels be destroyed in the battlefield.396.

gurmukhi: jy AisDuj qv SrnI pry ] iqn ky duSt duiKq hÍY mry ]
transliteration: Je Asidhuja Tva Sharanee Pare ॥ Tina Ke Dushatt Dukhita Havai Mare ॥
translation: O Supreme Destroyer ! those who sought Thy refuge, their enemies met painful death;

gurmukhi: purK jvn pgu pry iqhwry ] iqn ky qum sMkt sB twry ]397]
transliteration: Purakha Javana Pagu Pare Tihaare ॥ Tina Ke Tuma Saanktt Sabha Ttaare ॥397॥
translation: The persons who fell at Thy Feet, Thou didst remove all their troubles.397.

gurmukhi: jo kil kO iek bwr iDAYhY ] qw ky kwl inkit nih AYhY ]
transliteration: Jo Kali Kou Eika Baar Dhiaaihai ॥ Taa Ke Kaal Nikatti Nahi Aaihai ॥
translation: Those who meditate even on the Supreme Destroyer, the death cannot approach them;

gurmukhi: r`Cw hoie qwih sB kwlw ] duSt AirSt try qqkwlw ]398]
transliteration: Rachchhaa Hoei Taahi Sabha Kaala ॥ Dushatt Arishatt Ttare Tatakaala ॥398॥
translation: They remain protected at all times; their enemies and troubles come to and end instantly.398.

gurmukhi: ikRpw idRSwit qn jwih inhirho ] qwky qwp qnk mih hirho ]
transliteration: Karipaa Darishaatti Tana Jaahi Nihariho ॥ Taake Taapa Tanaka Mahi Hariho ॥
translation: Upon whomsoever Thou dost cast Thy favourable glance, they are absolved of sins instantly;

gurmukhi: ir`iD is`iD Gr moN sB hoeI ] duSt Cwh CÍY skY n koeI ]399]
transliteration: Ri`dhi Si`dhi Ghara Moaaŉ Sabha Hoeala ॥ Dushatt Chhaaha Chhavai Sakai Na Koeala ॥399॥
translation: They have all the worldly and spiritual pleasures in their homes; none of th enemies can even touch their shadow.399.

gurmukhi: eyk bwr ijn qumYN sMBwrw ] kwl Pws qy qwih aubwrw ]
transliteration: Eeka Baar Jina Tumai(n) Saanbhara ॥ kaal Phaas Te Taahi Aubaara ॥
translation: He, who remembered Thee even once, Thou didst protect him from the noose of death;

gurmukhi: ijn nr nwm iqhwro khw ] dwird duSt doK qy rhw ]400]
transliteration: Jina Nara Naam Tihaaro Kahaa ॥ Daarida Dushatt Dokha Te Rahaa ॥400॥
translation: Those persons, who repeated Thy Name, they were saved from poverty and attacks of enemies.400.

gurmukhi: KVg kyq mYN Srin iqhwrI ] Awp hwQ dY lyhu aubwrI ]
transliteration: Kharhaga Keta Mai(n) Sharani Tihaaree ॥ Aapa Haath Dai Lehu Aubaaree ॥
translation: Bestow thy help own me at all places protect me from the design of my enemies. 401.

gurmukhi: srb TOr mo hohu shweI ] duSt doK qy lyhu bcweI ]401]
transliteration: Sarab Tthoura Mo Hohu Sahaaeala ॥ Dushatt Dokha Te Lehu Bachaaeala ॥401॥
translation: Bestow Thy help on me at all places and protect me from the designs of my enemies.401.

gurmukhi: ikRpw krI hm pr jgmwqw ] gRMQ krw pUrn suB rwqw ]
transliteration: Karipaa Karee Hama Pra Jagamaata ॥ Garaantha Karaa Poorana Subha Raata ॥
translation: The Mother of the world has been kind towards me and I have completed the book this auspicious night;

gurmukhi: iklibK skl dyh ko hrqw ] duSt doiKXn ko CY krqw ]402]
transliteration: Kilabikha Sakala Deha Ko Harataa ॥ Dushatt Dokhiyana Ko Chhai Karataa ॥402॥
translation: The Lord is the destroyer of all the sins of the body and all the malicious and wicked persons.402.

gurmukhi: sRI AisDuj jb Bey dXwlw ] pUrn krw gRMQ qqkwlw ]
transliteration: Sree Asidhuja Jaba Bhaee Dayaala ॥ Poorana Karaa Garaantha Tatakaala ॥
translation: When Mahakal became kind, He immediately caused me to complete this book;

gurmukhi: mn bWCq Pl pwvY soeI ] dUK n iqsY ibAwpq koeI ]403]
transliteration: Mana Baachhata Phala Paavi Soeala ॥ Dookha Na Tisai Biaapata Koeala ॥403॥
translation: He will obtain the fruit desired by the mind (who will read or listen to this book) and no suffering will occur to him.403.

gurmukhi: AiV`l ]
transliteration: Arhi`la ॥
translation: ARRIL

gurmukhi: sunY guMg jo Xwih su rsnw pwveI ] sunY mUVH icq lwie cqurqw AwveI ]
transliteration: Sunai Guang Jo Yaahi Su Rasanaa Paaveala ॥ Sunai Moorharaha Chita Laaei Chaturataa Aaveala ॥
translation: The dumb, who will listen to it, will be blessed with the tongue to speak; the fool, who will listen to it attentively, will get wisdom;

gurmukhi: dUK drd BO inkt n iqn nr ky rhY ] ho jo XwkI eyk bwr cOpeI ko khY ]404]
transliteration: Dookha Darada Bhou Nikatt Na Tina Nara Ke Rahai ॥ Ho Jo Yaakee Eeka Baar Chaupaee Ko Kahai ॥404॥
translation: That person will be absolved of suffering, pain or fear, who will even once recite this Chaupai-prayer.404.

gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
transliteration: Chaupaee ॥
translation: CHAUPAI

gurmukhi: sMbq s`qRh shs Bix`jY ] ArD shs Puin qIin kih`jY ]
transliteration: Saanbata Sattraha Sahasa Bhanijjai ॥ Aradh Sahasa Phuni Teeni Kahijjai ॥
translation: It was Bikrami Samvat 1753;

gurmukhi: BwdRv sudI AStmI riv vwrw ] qIr squ`dRv gRMQ suDwrw ]405]
transliteration: Bhaadarava Sudee Ashattmee Ravi Vaara ॥ Teera Satu`darava Garaantha Sudhaara ॥405॥
translation: This book was competed on the banks of Sutlej on Sunday, the eighth Sudi of the month of Bhadon.

gurmukhi: sÍYXw ]
transliteration: Savaiyaa ॥
translation: SWAYYA

gurmukhi: pWie ghy jb qy qumry qb qy koaU AWK qry nhI AwnXo ] rwm rhIm purwn kurwn Anyk khYN mq eyk n mwnXo ]
transliteration: Paaei Gahe Jaba Te Tumare Taba Te Koaoo Aaaaŉkha Tare Nahee Aanayo ॥ Raam Raheema Puraana Kuraana Aneka Kahai(n) Mata Eeka Na Maanayo ॥
translation: O God ! the day when I caught hold of your feet, I do not bring anyone else under my sight; none other is liked by me now; the Puranas and the Quran try to know Thee by the names of Ram and Rahim and talk about you through several stories, but I do not ac

gurmukhi: isMimRiq swsqR byd sBY bhu Byd khY hm eyk n jwnXo ] sRI Aispwn ikRpw qumrI kir mY n khXo sB qoih bKwnXo ]863]
transliteration: Sianmriti Saastra Beda Sabhai Bahu Bheda Kahai Hama Eeka Na Jaanayo ॥ Sree Asipaana Karipaa Tumaree Kari Mai Na Kahayo Sabha Tohi Bakhaanayo ॥863॥
translation: The Simritis, Shastras and Vedas describe several mysteries of yours, but I do not agree with any of them. O sword-wielder God! This all has been described by Thy Grace, what power can I have to write all this?.863.

gurmukhi: dohrw ]
transliteration: Doharaa ॥
translation: DOHRA

gurmukhi: sgl duAwr kau Cwif kY ghXo quhwro duAwr ] bWih ghy kI lwj Ais goibMd dws quhwr ]864]
transliteration: Sagala Duaar Kau Chhaadi Kai Gahayo Tuhaaro Duaar ॥ Baahi Gahe Kee Laaja Asi Gobiand Daas Tuhaar ॥864॥
translation: O Lord ! I have forsaken all other doors and have caught hold of only Thy door. O Lord ! Thou has caught hold of my arm; I, Govind, am Thy serf, kindly take (care of me and) protect my honour.864.
